com.enixlin.jmrc.mapper

接口 RolerMapper


  • @Mapper
public interface RolerMapper

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • 方法详细资料

      • addRoler

        @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true,
         keyProperty="id",
         keyColumn="id")
 @Insert(value="insert into roler (name) value(#{name})")
Roler addRoler(Roler roler)

      • updateRoler

        @Update(value="update roler set name=#{name} where id=#{id}")
Roler updateRoler(Roler roler)

      • deleteRoler

        @Delete(value="delete from roler where id=#{id}")
int deleteRoler(Roler roler)

      • getRolerById

        @Select(value="select * from roler where id=#{id}")
Roler getRolerById(Roler roler)

      • getAllRolers

        @Select(value="select * from roler")
java.util.ArrayList<Roler> getAllRolers()

      • getAllRuleByRoler

        @Select(value="select rule.* from roler left join roler_rule on roler.id=roler_rule.roler_id left join rule on roler_rule.rule_id=rule.id where roler.id=#{id}")
java.util.ArrayList<Rule> getAllRuleByRoler(Roler roler)

      • addRolerRule

        @Options(useGeneratedKeys=true,
         keyProperty="id",
         keyColumn="id")
 @Insert(value="insert into roler_rule (roler_id,rule_id) value(#{roler.id},#{rule.id})")
int addRolerRule(@Param(value="roler")
                                                                                                                                                                                                   Roler roler,
                                                                                                                                                                                                   @Param(value="rule")
                                                                                                                                                                                                   Rule rule)

      • deleteRolerRule

        @Delete(value="delete from roler_rule where roler_id=#{id} and rule_id=#{id}")
int deleteRolerRule(@Param(value="roler")
                                                                                                    Roler roler,
                                                                                                    @Param(value="rule")
                                                                                                    Rule rule)
